modName: Crafting for Mages Alchemists and Warriors
summary: This mod adds 16 new crafting stations. Tailor clothes, combine soul gems, scribe scrolls/spell tomes, refill empty potions at barrels, combine potions.
descriptionHtml:
[b]
[center][size=+2][color=red]Description:[/color][/size][/center]

This Mod adds a lot of new features to Skyrim:

-Scribe Scrolls and Spell Tomes
-Reworked Bound Weapons
-Added an accessable Knapsack
-Automatic Linked Storage With Sorting
-Spinning Wheel to tailor all vanilla Clothes
-Craft and enchant Staves and additional Equipment
-Reforge Dragonpriest Masks
-combine and Split Soul Gems
-Combine Potions
-Refill empty Potions at any Alchemy Shop
-Two new Player Homes
-New Teleportation System

I designed this to fit seamingly into Skyrim. No Perks were altered and only minimal changes were made to certain cells.
Start off by Heading to the Archmage Quarters and use the Magical Workbench. The mod is supposed to explain itself from there.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[center][size=+2][color=red]Modules:[/color][/size][/center]

[color=green]Mage:[/color]
-Adds a spinning wheel to radiant raiment, which allows you to tailor all vanilla clothes
-This station also allows you to convert any hooded robes into non-hooded robes
-Faction gear available as clothes (only when member of the faction though)
-Adds scribing stations to Dragonsreach and the Archmage Quarters to scribe all vanilla tomes and scrolls
-Adds the magical workbench to the Archmage Quarters to craft all vanilla staves
-Add a soul forge to split and combine soul gems
-Advanced Techniques require the Magical Scholar Perk, which can be learned by reading the perk tome

[color=green]Masks:[/color]
-Adds the Dragon Priest Forge to the Labyrinthian
-Convert any Dragonpriest Mask into heavy, light or cloth
-Integrated [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17707]Open Dragon Priest Masks by Calyps - ODPM[/url]
-Integrated [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38319]DragonBornCirclets[/url] by Kiwi-Hawk with awesome textures from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6495/]Yuril[/url]
-To use the station the original mask has to be in your inventory

[color=green]Alchemist:[/color]
-Adds a new station to Alchemy shops that lets you combine potions and poisons
-Different Potions unlock at Alchemy 20-40-50-80-100
-Added more powerfull versions of the frenzy, fear,frostbite venom and damage health poison, which unlock at an alchemy level of 100.
-Requires the Perk "Combine Potions" (can be aquired from the Magical Workbench
-Adds potions and poison barrels around Skyrim. Simply craft a potion flask at the forge and refill them at any barrel

[color=green]Home:[/color]
-Adds a player home to which the player can teleport to and from
-includes all crafting stations and a nice armory

[color=green]Tree Home:[/color]
-Adapted from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25631]Tiny Tree Home[/url]
-Adds an immersive player home between Whiterun and Riverwood
-Also includes all crafting stations

[color=green]Bound Weapons:[/color]
Dual Casting a bound weapon now has a different effect:
-Dual cast bound dagger to conjure a fast, but low damage short bow
-Dual cast bound sword to conjure a greatsword
-Dual cast bound bow to conjure a slow, but high damage longbow
-Dual cast bound war axe to conjure a battleaxe
-The mesh and idea for the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29950]Longbow[/url] comes from granitz
-The meshes for the greatsword, war axe, mace and hammer [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29259]warden01[/url]
-New spells require a conjuration level of 50 before they can be scribed

[color=green]Storage in Homes:[/color]
-Adds a hanging knapsack to every player home
-Includes shared storage and a sorting system

[color=green]Linked Storage:[/color]
-Adds crafting storage to blacksmiths in major towns
-You can only store crafting materials

[color=green]Hearthfire DLC:[/color]
-Recipe for glass added to forge
-Added possibility to create empty potion flask from glass
-Shared storage to all new homes

[color=green]Dawnguard DLC:[/color]
-Recipe for vampire armor added to the spinning wheel.
-Dawngaurd equipment craftable at the forge in Fort Dawnguard
-Shared storage added to both castles
-Added a new teleportation system, called "the Nexus" (idea and images come from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27572]Wayshrines of Tamriel[/url]

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[center][size=+2][color=red]Installation:[/color][/size][/center]

-Download and install the core Module
-Install the Module Pack
-Choose which modules to activate
-Easy as that

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=red]Compatability:[/color]
-Should be compatable with almost anything
-Small cell edits were made to: archmagequarters, some alchemy shops, player homes

[color=red]Requirements:[/color]
-Updated Version of Skyrim
-Dragonborn DLC

[color=red]Bugs:[/color]
-if the bound weapons are not working correctly, try sitting in a chair, this seems to help ;)
-bound war axe is turned to the wrong side when summoned, seems to be a small problem with the mesh, would appreciate any help

[color=red]Changelog:[/color]
0.9 -initial release
0.91 -added the possibility to combine 3 soul gem fragments into 1 petty soul gem (Thanks to emieri00 and Gudiomen for the idea)
0.93 -added support for Dragonborn Items
0.94 -added recipe for roll of paper, cause it was hard to find
0.99 -moved some crafting stations -new stations Potion Barrel, Poison Barrel, Potion Combiner, Circlet Bust
0.991 -minor bug fix -toned down the book of destruction
0.999 -major update - please read the description
1.00 -minor bug fix - added steel weapons as jewelry -bound weapons (see description)
1.01 -minor bug fix -added bound pickaxe spell -finally a no perk version ;)
1.02 -linked chests now with automatic storage (thanks to Manilla Turtle) -made skaal armor craftable -added chest to radiant raiment -adjusted to new skyrim update
1.03 -some fine tuning -added message boxes to some stations, the mod now better explains itself to the player (Diamok helped me out with the scripts)
2.00 -reworked the mod from scratch -updated the scripts and mod is now modular, also many new features !!!!
2.01 - very minor bug fixes
2.02 -fixed mesh for bound warhammer
2.05 -Final release, I added everything that I wanted, from here I will only provide bug fixes

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=red]Credits:[/color]

I used the work of several modders from the Nexus and would like to credit them here. If you enjoy anything from this mod, please visit their page to endorse their mod as well. Without their work none of this would have been possible.

First of all Bethesda for creating an awesome game
Second thanks to my wife for keeping up with my sheit ;)
